segments.text: Ahem ... uh , sir , I beg your pardon ... Uh , mister , are you waiting to buy a ticket for the movie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's it look like , lady ? This is the ticket line I'm standing in , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , what's your beef anyway , lady ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You just cut into line , in front of me and everyone else , that's what ! Go take your place back at the end of the line , like every - one else !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh sure , lady , and fat chance I'd get a ticket before they're sold out . I'm staying right here , understand ? So be a nice lady and butt out !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just what gives you the right ... ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I'm no sucker ; only suckers go to the end of the line . It's as simple as that , lady .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , lady , just to show what a gentleman I really am , I'll let you go in front of me . Now , just buy your ticket and shut your trap , will you , lady ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Whew ! I got the last one . This must be my lucky day !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What was that you just said ? Last one ... ? Hey , they've closed the ticket window !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'm afraid I bought the last ticket , and to think , if you hadn't been such a gentleman . . .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Lady ! This is unfair ! I've been cheated ! I was in line before you.That should have been my ticket ! Come on , hand it over , lady !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Gentleman ! Hah ! Fat chance ! Hah ! Eat your heart out , sucker ! Hah !
segments.speaker: S1
